title: Store doesn't know how much IP i have

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I currently have 5367 IP. 
Trying to purchase Brand, for 4800 IP. 
Yet, the store claims i do not have enough RP/IP to purchase him. 

Anyone else got this going on?
:(

replies.body: This is fixed by switching to the legacy client and buying something

This is an issue we've seen pop up after the store outage the other day. I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can sort this out with you! ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions, friend.
